overview: A film noir with three deaths, two robberies and an escape. Two women in their fifties are set to meet on the banks of the Douro River. When Vera was young, she could not take care of her son and had to give him up for adoption. When Cora was young, her doctor told her that she could not have children and that only by adopting could she form a family. Both share the experience of having been mothers of a boy named Egoz. Now, our two protagonists meet again in Portugal to review the story of their lives and rewrite their destinies.
title: Sobre todo de noche
